instruction: Summarize the content below in 50 words or fewer.
input: The Chinese Communist Party (CCP) has ruled China for over seven decades and continues to hold an iron grip on political life in the country. It has established an extensive party-state apparatus to bolster its power and influence, as well as develop an economy that is largely directed by the party. It has sought to also control the Internet and other forms of communication, while ushering in a new era of economic and technological development
output: The CCP has been ruling China for over 70 years and has constructed a powerful state apparatus to maintain its dominance. It has suppressed communication through controlling the Internet. Additionally, it has enabled a new and impressive economic and technological growth in the country.
